topic.title: History Of Past Illness Section - conformance rules

section.p: The History of Past Illness Section contains data about problems the patient suffered in the past.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE History Of Past Illness Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.8)
SHALL conform to CDT Past Medical History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.9)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.7)
SHALL conform to CDT Past Medical History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.9)
SHALL conform to IHE History Of Past Illness Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.8)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11348-0" HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.7)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains clinical statements.
[OCL]: not self.entry->isEmpty()
